title: Unable to see friends game length
body:
I have a friend who i want to play with but every time i hover over that persons name it doesnt tell me how many minutes that person is in the game.
about 98% of my other friend i can see their game length, Please fix this

replies.body: This can happen if your OS clock is out of sync.  Getting that [back in sync](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues#wq3) should fix it!
